KnowledgeBase.Title: Example Character compare 010
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: comparison compareEQ compareGT compareNE compareLT compareLE

Example.Description: These examples use the compare functions to do a case-sensitive comparison of two objects of the same type. A Boolean value is returned.

Syntax.Note:
The value of the first object is lesser than the value
of the second object.

The value of the first object is greater than the value
of the second object.
Syntax.Hints: If you prefer a Boolean resulting from the comparison , use the compareEQ, compareNE, compareGT, compareLT functions.
